name: .TDESKTOP-THEME
summary: Learn about .TDESKTOP-THEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: When you download a TDESKTOP-THEME file within Telegram Desktop, the program will show you a preview of the theme. In the Theme Preview window, click APPLY THIS THEME to apply the theme your TDESKTOP-THEME file contains.
You can also change Telegram Desktop's theme from the Settings â†’ Chat Settings screen.
